product_name: Gear Aid Seam Grip Seam Sealer
long_description: Winner of the prestigious Backpacker Magazine's Editors' Choice Gold Award, the all-purpose Gear Aid Seam Grip Seam Sealer helps waterproof your gear for outdoor fun in wet weather. Use this handy seam sealer on tents, backpacks, mittens, gaiters, foul-weather gear and more, or to repair small rips and holes. All seams must be completely sealed in order for an item to be totally waterproof. Easy to use-simply squeeze lightly and draw tube across the seam; seal seams from the inside whenever possible. Before use, clean surfaces with isopropyl alcohol. One-oz. tube of Gear Aid Seam Grip Seam Sealer is generally enough to seal all the main floor and rainfly seams on a typical two-person backpacking tent.
short_description: Winner of the prestigious Backpacker Magazine's Editors' Choice Gold Award, the all-purpose Gear Aid Seam Grip Seam Sealer helps waterproof your gear for outdoor fun in wet weather.
